text:
TaskUs is a tech
enabled business process
outsourcing company.

And what we do is we combine
the exceptional human talent
with GenAI technology so

that we can deliver the best
outcome for our clients.
So my team is responsible

for bringing innovation
within the organization.
We work very closely with our clients
and our operations team so

that we can bring the
best technology tools
for our teammates.

Our teammates are the ones that
deliver customer experience
for the best brands in the world.

And by providing these tools
to them, they are now able

to focus more on bringing
empathy to their conversation

and less on the mechanical
aspects of the transactions.
And we leverage GenAI technology so

that we can accentuate all
these outcomes for our clients.

AWS is our chosen cloud partner
where we have been running

all our workload for
almost a decade now.
We have been working very closely with AWS
to build technology solutions

and with the advent of
generative AI, now we are able
to leverage the AI capabilities

to power our TaskGPT
platform, which is used

to deliver products to our
clients and our customers.
Amazon Bedrock provides us a diversity
of large language models.

It provides us the ability
to consume them on an

consumption basis, plus it is
tightly integrated into our

overall AWS applications
that we use today.
So it comes with inherent security.

It has the ability to
have built-in guardrails

that help us ground the
inference or the responses.
We can now also use fine tuning along
with prompt engineering for some
of the capabilities that we can deliver.

With the Meta Llama model,
we have the ability
to use the model on Amazon Bedrock, which
also provides ability to fine tune.

TaskGPT platform leverages
Meta's Llama model

to help our teammates with
paraphrasing comprehension
of the content, generating content as well
as performing complex tasks.
Generative AI can deliver big results
for our clients.
As a business process outsourcer,
we get measured on our KPIs,

typically average handle
time on chat and voice
and customer satisfaction
of the customer that they're serving.

And if you can leverage
generative AI using the TaskGPT

platform to remove the
mechanical aspects of the work,

then our teammates can focus
on the customer interaction.

They can bring empathy,
they can have the answers

to the customer interactions
at their fingertips,

and that would help
improve our performance,
which is a differentiator for us.
The benefits are really clear.
We have seen close to 10% reduction on
chat interactions

and 20% reduction on average
handle time for voice.

We have also seen our customer
satisfaction improve
by over 10% because we are able

to provide the answers really
quickly to our customers.

Amazon Bedrock provides us
the time to value in terms

of speed, as well as
the cost effectiveness
of delivering results for our clients.
